mapper.select: select from plogging.tbl_product (product_number, product_name, product_detail, product_price, product_color, product_size, product_category, product_popularity, product_review_numbers, product_inventory_total, product_inventory_sold) VALUES(#{productNumber}, #{productName}, #{productDetail}, #{productPrice}, #{productColor}, #{productSize} #{productCategory}, #{productPopularity}, #{productReveiwNumbers}, #{productInventoryTotal}, #{productInventorySold})
